February Deposit Match: รับผลตอบแทนมากขึ้นจากการฝากเงินทุกครั้งในเดือนกุมภาพันธ์

February Deposit Match: Get more from every deposit this February

11m ago//KrakenFX
general
AI

Summary

TH

Kraken เปิดตัวโปรโมชัน "February Deposit Match" ที่มอบโบนัสจับคู่ 3% สำหรับการฝากเงินสดหรือ Crypto ใหม่ระหว่างวันที่ 2 กุมภาพันธ์ ถึง 9 มีนาคม 2026 ข้อเสนอนี้ใช้ได้กับยอดฝากที่มีคุณสมบัติตั้งแต่ 1 ดอลลาร์ไปจนถึง 1,000,000 ดอลลาร์ โดยผู้ใช้ต้องลงทะเบียนผ่าน Kraken app เพื่อรับสิทธิ์ โปรโมชันนี้ไม่มีการแบ่งระดับหรือต้องสมัครสมาชิกรายเดือน แต่มอบอัตราที่เท่ากันสำหรับทุกคน ผู้เข้าร่วมต้องปฏิบัติตามเงื่อนไขการถือครองเงินรางวัลเป็นเวลา 18 เดือนนับจากวันที่ 9 มีนาคม 2026 แต่สามารถเทรดหรือใช้ฟีเจอร์บนแพลตฟอร์มอย่าง Staking ได้ตามปกติในช่วงเวลาดังกล่าว โปรโมชันนี้ไม่รวมการโอนเงินระหว่าง Kraken และ Kraken Pro และการฝากเงินผ่านบัตรเครดิตหรือเดบิต โดยมีจุดประสงค์เพื่อส่งเสริมให้ผู้ใช้นำสินทรัพย์เข้ามาใช้งานบน Kraken พร้อมรับความคุ้มค่าเพิ่มเติม

EN

Kraken has launched the "February Deposit Match" promotion, offering a flat 3% match on new cash or crypto deposits made between February 2, 2026, and March 9, 2026. The incentive applies to eligible deposits ranging from $1 to $1,000,000 USD, requiring users to enroll via the Kraken app to participate. Unlike tiered systems, this offer provides a consistent rate for all users without requiring a monthly subscription. Participants must adhere to an 18-month holding period for the matched rewards starting March 9, 2026, though they are free to trade and use on-platform features like Staking during this time. The promotion excludes transfers between Kraken and Kraken Pro as well as credit or debit card deposits. This initiative aims to encourage users to deposit assets and utilize Kraken’s trading tools with added value.

Key Points

  • Kraken offers a 3% match on new cash or crypto deposits from Feb 2 to March 9, 2026.
  • Eligible deposits range from $1 to $1,000,000 USD, excluding credit/debit card funding.
  • Requires app enrollment and an 18-month hold period for the reward, though trading is allowed.

Article

February is about momentum, and for a limited time, Kraken is giving you more reason to put your assets to work. With our February Deposit Match , you’ll receive a 3% match on new cash or crypto deposits , a straightforward way to add meaningful value the moment your funds arrive on Kraken. It’s a simple, competitive incentive designed to reward everyone equally and make depositing on Kraken even more worthwhile. No tiers. No gating behind a monthly subscription. Just real value, applied clearly. What is the February Deposit Match? The February Deposit Match rewards new on‑platform deposits made between February 2, 2026 and March 9, 2026 . After enrolling in the Kraken app, you’ll earn a flat 3% match on eligible deposits whether you’re funding your account for the first time, moving assets onto Kraken, or adding to an existing portfolio. Promotion details Deposit window: February 2, 2026 – March 9, 2026 Match rate: 3% Eligible assets: Cash or crypto Deposit range: From $1 up to $1,000,000 USD total Hold period: 18 months from March 9, 2026 Enrollment: Required in the Kraken app All eligible deposits made during the promotion window count toward your total whether you deposit once or over the course of the month. One simple rate, for everyone We’ve kept our 3% deposit match straightforward on purpose. Every eligible participant receives the same flat rate , applied consistently across all qualifying deposits: 3% match on new cash or crypto deposits Applies from $1 up to $1,000,000 USD total during the promotion No changing rates. Just a clear incentive you can understand from the start. Deposit your way Everyone funds their account differently, so the February Deposit Match is designed to stay flexible. You can: Deposit in one transaction or many Use a combination of cash and crypto Fund your account using supported methods (credit and debit cards are not eligible) As long as deposits are new funds on‑platform and made between February 2, 2026 and March 9, 2026, they’re included.* Transfers between Kraken and Kraken Pro do not qualify as new deposits. How to get started Getting started takes just a few steps: Open the Kraken app Enroll in the February Deposit Match ** Deposit new cash or crypto between February 2, 2026 and March 9, 2026 That’s it. Built for what comes next Depositing on Kraken gives you access to the right tools once your funds are on‑platform. After you deposit, you can: Trade across supported spot markets Access simple yet powerful features to grow your assets such as Recurring Buys, Bundles and Staking Use eligible on‑platform products without affecting your promotion eligibility You’re free to trade and manage your assets throughout both the promotion window and the 18-month hold period (March 9, 2026 – September 9, 2027). Qualification is based on the value of your net deposits during the promotion period, not market performance. Deposit now and start your 3% match If you’ve been waiting for the right moment to move funds onto Kraken, this is it. The February Deposit Match is a limited‑time opportunity to get more from your deposits, backed by Kraken’s focus on security, transparency, and a level playing field for everyone. * Rewards are subject to an 18-month holding requirement and may be clawed back if eligibility conditions are not maintained, as outlined in our Terms and Conditions . ** Auto Earn must be enabled in the process of enrolling in the February Deposit Match. Opting in to Opt-In-Rewards (OIR) is not required to participate or receive the 3% match.
